string.text: The weather is warm today and nothing happens.
Stalkers, help, I'm in the tunnel near the railway embankment! Help, hurry up! Damn, is there anyone around here?!
I've left a case near the southern outpost, close to the loads of scrap metal and all kinds of rubbish. Sidorovich, send one of your own while no one finds out.
Some nonsense is happening at the checkpoint. Guys, it's better to steer away from there until everything stops.
I saw a group of soldiers unearth some documents. I think traders will pay well for these documents.
Damned mutants are trying to enter into the Bar! Guys, help us fight them back!
Help, SOS! There's a powerful mutant! I'm at the construction site!
We need help fighting off the mutants! We are at the military base!
Random assignment: find the case in the Cordon
According to an intercepted message, someone has left a case for Sidorovich near an outpost in a pile of rubbish. The first one must be found.
Random assignment: deliver the case to Sidorovich
You have discovered the case. Now, it must be delivered to Sidorovich.
A container. Sidorovich may have use for it.
A case that traders need. You can sell it for a good price.
